participant_1.name: Ethan Carter
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and dedicated, Ethan thrives on challenges and is deeply passionate about his work as a stunt double. He enjoys engaging with literature and is disciplined in his lifestyle choices.
participant_1.background: i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. i am a stunt double as my second job. i read twenty books a year. i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher.

participant_2.name: Lila Morgan
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and fun-loving, Lila enjoys her time with friends and indulges in classic comfort food. She values her relationship and prefers a casual lifestyle.
participant_2.background: i don't drink soda. i've a boyfriend. i live in a house. i like to eat hamburgers and french fries.
